task.title: Generating meeting reports
task.shortdesc: By default, all meetings listed on the Recent tab are available for 90 days. Meeting reports are not accessible for meetings removed from the list.

context.p: You can generate a report during the meeting by selecting the download button from the participants list. For more information refer to .
To generate meeting reports from the Meetings homepage, follow these steps.

step.cmd: On your Meetings homepage, select the Recent tab. A list of your recent meetings is displayed.
Find the meeting, and then select the three dots on the right for the settings.
Hover over Meeting reports, and then select the report type.

choices.choice:
Summary—Select this option to download a summary of the meeting details as well as the participant list. A summary report includes the following details:
Date
Start time
End time
Duration
Moderated
Guest allowed
Password
Dial-in

Full report—Select this option to download a full report. This report includes the basic information provided in a summary report, as well as the following information:
Moderators
Presenters
Meeting recordings
Meeting activity log
Chat transcript
